PLAY.TITLE: The Taming of the Shrew

PERSONAE.TITLE: Dramatis Personae

PGROUP.PERSONA: Hostess, Page, Players, Huntsmen, and Servants.

PERSONAE.PERSONA: BAPTISTA, a rich gentleman of Padua.
VINCENTIO, an old gentleman of Pisa.
LUCENTIO, son to Vincentio, in love with Bianca.
PETRUCHIO, a gentleman of Verona, a suitor to Katharina.
Tailor, Haberdasher, and Servants attending on Baptista and Petruchio.

PLAY.SCNDESCR: SCENE Padua, and Petruchio's country house.

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Before an alehouse on a heath.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Horns winded. Enter a Lord from hunting, with his train

SPEECH.SPEAKER: Lord
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Some bear out SLY. A trumpet sounds

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. A bedchamber in the Lord's house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter aloft SLY, with Attendants; some with apparel,
others with basin and ewer and appurtenances; and Lord
Enter the Page as a lady, with attendants

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Padua. A public place.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter LUCENTIO and his man TRANIO

Enter BAPTISTA, KATHARINA, BIANCA, GREMIO, and
HORTENSIO. LUCENTIO and TRANIO stand by

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. Padua. Before HORTENSIO'S house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter PETRUCHIO and his man GRUMIO
He wrings him by the ears

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Padua. A room in BAPTISTA'S house.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BAPTISTA
SPEECH.STAGEDIR:
Exit Servant, with LUCENTIO and HORTENSIO,
BIONDELLO following

SCENE.STAGEDIR: Re-enter HORTENSIO, with his head broke

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. Padua. Before BAPTISTA'S house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter BAPTISTA, GREMIO, TRANIO, KATHARINA, BIANCA,
LUCENTIO, and others, attendants
Exit weeping, followed by BIANCA and others

Re-enter PETRUCHIO, KATHARINA, BIANCA, BAPTISTA,
HORTENSIO, GRUMIO, and Train

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PETRUCHIO

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. Padua. Before BAPTISTA'S house.
SCENE III. A room in PETRUCHIO'S house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter PETRUCHIO and HORTENSIO with meat

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. Padua. Before BAPTISTA'S house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter TRANIO, and the Pedant dressed like VINCENTIO

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE V. A public road.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter PETRUCHIO, KATHARINA, HORTENSIO, and Servants

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Padua. Before LUCENTIO'S house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
GREMIO discovered. Enter behind BIONDELLO,
LUCENTIO, and BIANCA

Enter PETRUCHIO, KATHARINA, VINCENTIO, GRUMIO,
with Attendants
Pedant looks out of the window
Re-enter Pedant below; TRANIO, BAPTISTA, and Servants
Re-enter BIONDELLO, with LUCENTIO and BIANCA

Exeunt BIONDELLO, TRANIO, and Pedant, as fast
as may be

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. Padua. LUCENTIO'S house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter BAPTISTA, VINCENTIO, GREMIO, the Pedant,
LUCENTIO, BIANCA, PETRUCHIO, KATHARINA, HORTENSIO,
and Widow, TRANIO, BIONDELLO, and GRUMIO the
Serving-men with Tranio bringing in a banquet

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PETRUCHIO
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Re-enter KATHARINA, with BIANCA and Widow
